a state in the southeastern US between the Gulf of Mexico and the Atlantic Ocean, whose capital city is Tallahassee : At one time, nearly half of Florida was covered in wetlands. She now lives in Florida.
More examplesFewer examplesCentral Florida was struck by a tornado.He was on a plane to Florida before he knew it.
